description: Non-material amendment to planning permission reference 18/5941/FUL dated 26/06/19 for `Demolition and redevelopment of Finchley Reform Synagogue to provide new two-storey Synagogue including kindergarten and associated community facilities. Provision of refuse/recycling storage, 11no. off-street parking spaces, cycle parking and landscaping. ` Amendments to include:-Entrance repositioned to reduce congestion at the corner of the site within the foyer-Reduction in the number of windows in the south and west facing facades to reduce overheating-Development of M&E strategy to ensure sufficient ventilation level, resulting in; alteration to intake and extract grilles, alteration to height of the first-floor slab and terrace level (and acoustic screen), raising of the height of the lift overrun-Amendment to the internal layout to provide improved natural daylighting and ventilation to the youth hall-Reposition of the secondary escape stair-Minor alteration to external wall position around escape stair resulting in smaller envelope in this location-Minor amendments to position of rooflights within the roof-Reorganisations of the PV layout and green roof-Creation of external refuse storage area-Amendments to external works as a result of layout changes-General internal layout amendments
